title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 162.2 - Maintenance; method of performing controlled blasting operations
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 162.2 - Maintenance; method of performing controlled blasting operations

State Regulations

Every county and town highway superintendent shall comply
with the requirements contained in 12 NYCRR
39.7
with regard to blasting
operations, and with the requirements contained in 12 NYCRR Part
12
relating to
the possession, handling, storage and transportation of explosives (also known
as Industrial Code 39 of the Department of Labor, Board of Standards and

Appeals) in the performance of blasting operations for the improvement or
maintenance of highways and bridges under his jurisdiction. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17
ยง
162.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
